title: Rabit: Burrows for the Agentic Web
description: Specification and reference implementation for Rabit, a convention for publishing agent-friendly content spaces. This is a Bun.js monorepo with packages for the client, server, and OpenCode plugin.

agents.context: Official Rabit project repository. Contains the v0.3.0 specification (docs/rabit-spec-v0.3.0.md), reference implementations in packages/ (rabit-client, rabit-server, rabit-mcp), and example burrows in examples/.
hints: The specification document (docs/rabit-spec-v0.3.0.md) is the authoritative reference
The packages/rabit-client directory contains a TypeScript/Bun client implementation
The examples/ directory contains example burrows demonstrating the format
